description.value: Excellent pastry shop with homemade specialties, featuring the traditional Florentine rice pudding, plus vegan and gluten-free croissants. Open daily from 6:30 AM. Continental breakfast served from 9:00 AM.
Elegant café with exceptional pastries and beautiful atmosphere. Brunch served until 11:30 AM. Open daily from 7:00 AM.
Charming and intimate café tucked away on a small street. A local favorite among boutique workers. Open Monday to Saturday from 7:30 AM.
Outstanding raw and vegan pastry shop located in one of Florence’s most beautiful squares. Open daily from 8:30 AM.
Lovely café and restaurant with irresistible cakes—perfect for an afternoon break. Open Tuesday to Sunday from 10:00 AM.
